lead_paragraph: A senior Chinese government adviser has warned that the country's internet censorship is hampering scientific research and economic development, in a rare public criticism of a sensitive policy that the government has vigorously defended.
snippet: A senior Chinese government adviser has warned that the country's internet censorship is hampering scientific research and economic development, in a rare public criticism of a sensitive policy that the government has vigorously defended....

headline.main: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship
headline.print_headline: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship
